description:
Demolition of existing parks equipment maintenance workshops within Rosemary Gardens, including the section of boundary wall separating it from the vacant land and lowering of ground level of former workshop site to same level as that of the vacant land.

Erection on depot site and vacant land of a new parks maintenance depot (providing a base for equipment and vehicles used in the maintenance of parks in Islington and for park maintenance staff).  The entrance to the new maintenance depot would be from Downham Road via the existing accessway.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The precise siding of the single storey storage building to the east end of the site together with the adjoining gate, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works and be maintained permanently in this manner.

REASON:  To protect residential amenity.
